verses.text: PEA lea ‘a Sāmiuela ki ‘Isileli kātoa ‘o pehē, Ko eni kuo u fakaongo kiate kimoutolu ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē na‘a mou lea ai kiate au, pea kuo u fakanofo hamou tu‘i.
Pea vakai ko e tu‘i ena ‘oku laka ‘i homou ‘ao: pea ko au kuo u motu‘a mo hinā; ka ko ‘eku fānau ena ‘oku ‘iate kimoutolu: pea kuo u taka ‘i homou ‘ao talu ‘eku talavou ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.

Ko au eni: mou fakamo‘oni kiate au ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova, pea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ‘ene pani; ko e pulu ‘o hai kuo u to‘o? Pe ko e ‘asi ‘o hai kuo u ‘ave? Pea ko hai ha taha kuo u fakahekeheke‘i? Mo hai ha taha kuo u fakamālohi‘i? Pe kuo u tali mei he nima ‘o hai ha koloa ke fakakuikui ‘aki au? ka u fakafoki ia kiate kimoutolu.
Pea nau pehē, Kuo ‘ikai te ke fakahekeheke‘i kimautolu, pe te ke fakamālohia, pea kuo ‘ikai te ke tali mei he nima ‘o ha taha ha momo‘i me‘a.

Pea ne pehē kiate kinautolu, Ko e fakamo‘oni ‘a Sihova kiate kimoutolu, pea ko e fakamo‘oni mo ‘ene pani he ‘aho ni, ki he ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo‘i hoku nima ha momo‘i me‘a. Pea nau pehē. Ko e fakamo‘oni ia.
Pea me‘a ‘a Sāmiuela ki he kakai, Ko Sihova ia na‘a ne fokotu‘u ‘a Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone, mo ne ‘omi ho‘omou ngaahi kui mei he fonua ko ‘Isipite.
Pea ko eni mou tu‘u mai ke tau sivi mo au ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki ‘a e tonuhia ‘a Sihova, ‘i he ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne fai ‘i he‘ene feangai mo kimoutolu mo ho‘omou ngaahi kui.

‘I he ha‘u ‘a Sēkope ki ‘Isipite, pea tautapa ‘e ho‘omou ngaahi kui kia Sihova, na‘a ne fekau atu ‘a Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone, ‘a ia na‘a na ‘omi ho‘omou ngaahi tamai mei ‘Isipite ‘o fakanofo ‘i he potu ko eni.

Ka na‘e ngalo ‘iate kinautolu ‘a Sihova ko honau ‘Otua, pea ne fakatau kinautolu ki he nima ‘o Siselā, ko e kapiteni ‘o e tau ‘a Hasoa, pea ki he nima ‘o e kau Filisitia, pea ki he nima ‘o e Tu‘i Moape, pea nau tau‘i kinautolu.

Pea nau tautapa kia Sihova, ‘o nau pehē, Kuo mau hia, he kuo mau li‘aki ‘a Sihova, pea kuo mau tauhi ‘a e ngaahi Peali mo e ngaahi ‘Asiteloti: ka ko eni ke ke hamusi kimautolu mei he nima ‘o homau ngaahi fili, pea te mau tauhi koe.
Pea fekau atu ‘e Sihova ‘a Selupeali, mo Pēlake, mo Sēfita, mo Sāmiuela, ‘o ne hamusi kimoutolu mei he nima ‘o homou ngaahi fili takatakai, pea mou nofo nonga.

Ka ‘i ho‘omou vakai ki he ha‘u ‘a Nā‘asi ko e Tu‘i Ha‘a ‘Āmoni, ke fai ha me‘a kiate kimoutolu, na‘a mou pehē kiate au, ‘Ikai, ka ‘e pule ha tu‘i kiate kitautolu: ‘osi, ko homou tu‘i ‘a Sihova ko homou ‘Otua.
Pea ko eni, vakai ‘a e tu‘i kuo mou fili, ‘a ia na‘a mou kole ki ai: he vakai kuo ‘atu ‘e Sihova hamou tu‘i.

Kapau te mou ‘apasia ki he ‘Eiki, ‘o tauhi ia mo fakaongo ki hono le‘o, ‘o ‘ikai te mou angatu‘u ki he‘ene fekau tonu, pea te mou toki ‘i he fa‘ahi ‘a Sihova ko homou ‘Otua, ‘a kimoutolu mo e tu‘i foki ‘oku pule kiate kimoutolu.
Ka ‘o kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fakaongo ki he le‘o ‘o Sihova, ka mou angatu‘u ki he‘ene fekau tonu, pea ‘e toki ‘iate kimoutolu ‘a e nima ‘o Sihova hangē ko ‘ene ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi kui, ke kovi.
Pea ko eni foki, mou tu‘u ma‘u ‘o mamata ki he fu‘u me‘a ni, ‘a ia ka fai ‘e Sihova ‘i homou mata tonu.
‘Ikai ko e ututa‘u uite eni? Ka u ui kia Sihova ke ne tuku mai ha ngaahi mana mo ha ‘uha; ka mou ‘ilo ‘o sio, ‘oku lahi ho‘omou kovi ‘a ia kuo fai ‘i he ‘ao tonu ‘o Sihova, ‘i he kole hamou tu‘i.
Ko ia na‘e ui ‘a Sāmiuela ki he ‘Eiki: pea tuku mai ‘e he‘ene ‘Afio ‘a e mana mo e ‘uha ‘i he ‘aho ko ia: pea manavahē lahi ‘a e kakai kia Sihova pea kia Sāmiuela.

Pea lea ‘a e kakai kotoa kia Sāmiuela, ‘o pehē, Ke ke hūfia ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki ko kimautolu kia Sihova ko ho ‘Otua, ke ‘oua na‘a mau mate: he kuo mau kanoni ‘aki ‘emau ngaahi angahala kotoa ‘a e kovi ni, ‘a e kole hamau tu‘i.

Pea me‘a ‘a Sāmiuela ki he kakai, ‘Oua te mou manavahē: mo‘oni kuo mou fai ‘a e fu‘u kovi ko ē: ka neongo ia, ‘oua te mou afe mei he muimui kia Sihova, ka mou tauhi ki he‘ene ‘Afio ‘aki ‘a e kotoa ‘o homou loto;
‘io ‘oua te mou afe: he ko e muimui ia ki he ngaahi nge‘esi me‘a, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘anau ‘aonga, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te nau lava ha fakamo‘ui; he ko e koto nge‘esi pē.
He tala‘ehai ‘e li‘aki ‘e he ‘Eiki hono kakai telia hono fu‘u huafa: he kuo finangalo ‘a Sihova ke ngaohi kimoutolu mōno kakai.
Ko e me‘a kiate au foki, molekemama‘o ha‘aku hia kia Sihova, ‘i he‘eku tuku ‘eku hūfia kimoutolu: ka te u fale‘i kimoutolu ‘i he hala ‘oku lelei mo totonu.
Ko e me‘a ke mou ‘apasia kia Sihova, mo tauhi ia mo‘oni, ‘aki ‘a e kotoa ‘o homou loto: he mou vakai ‘ene fai me‘a lahi he feangai mo kimoutolu.
Ka ‘o kapau te mou taukave pē ho‘omou faikovi, te mou ‘auha ‘a kimoutolu mo homou tu‘i.
